name: 陳彥璋
objective: 使學者學習流體力學基本理論。課程內容概要：(1)緒論、(2)真實流體流動、(3)管流理論、(4)可壓縮性流體、(5)邊界層理論、(6)昇力理論、(7)渠流理論。
schedule:
Specific Elements：
1.　　Introduction.
A.　　Fluid behavior.
B.　　Fluids Properties
2.　　Fluid statics.
A.　　Hydrostatic forces.
B.　　Pressure measurement by manometers.
C.　　Static forces on surfaces.
3.　　Dynamics.
A.　　Fluid dynamics.
B.　　Continuity and conservation of mass.
C.　　The Bernoulli equation.
D.　　The Momentum equation.
4.　　Viscous flow in pipes.
5.　　Flow measurements. 
6.　　Dimensional analysis.
scorePolicy:
Workload: Midterm and final exam(s), tests, and homework.  Homework assignments will be handed out in class after pertinent subject matter is covered in the lecture and graded regularly.  Students will have one week to submit the homework assignment. Timely submission of homework is essential.  NO LATE HOMEWORK WILL BE ACCEPTED.

Grade: 25% quizzes, 25% midterm exam, 30% final exam, 10% Homework, 10% class participation.
materials: Engineering Fluid Mechanics, 9th Ed., C. T. Crowe, D. F. Elger, J. A. Roberson, Wiley, 2010.
